name: Vic Viper T301
desc: When an attack is declared involving your face-up monster and an opponent's monster: You can Special Summon this card from the GY (if it was there when that attack was declared) or hand (even if not), but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Vic Viper T301" once per turn. All other LIGHT Machine monsters you control gain 1200 ATK.
